channel.title: UnpackedShops!
channel.description:
Hey! I am currently trying to work on Unpacked shops! I have set it all up right, here is one of the lines of my file.
1 995 true - Edgeville General Store - 1931 30 1935 10 1735 10 1925 30 1923 10 1887 10 590 10 1755 10 2347 10 550 10 9003 10
How can I change the cost of certain items and how do I assign the shop to certain NPC's? Any help is much appreciated.
